Header.title: Akinos Consulting
Header.paragraph: Akinos Consulting delivers enterprise quality data analytics, web scraping and automation solutions for teams and investors.

paragraph: Akinos Consulting delivers data and automation solutions to teams and investors across diverse sectors.
We provide comprehensive data collection services including web scraping of unstructured/public data and working with complex APIs to access large databases.
We transform raw data into digestible visualizations, allowing clients to make data-driven decisions.
Akinos Consulting also provides automation services for data entry, social media engagement and other repetitive, web-based tasks.

Testimonials.text: Andrew increased my sales and helped grow my brand by building me tools to find and connect with potential clients.
Testimonials.name: Founder, Pistol Practice

Testimonials.text: Andrew collected data from complex APIs, built a database and created insightful clinical trial data visualzations that helped our team secure funding.
Testimonials.name: Chief Scientist, Araneus Bio

Testimonials.text: Working with Andrew has allowed our business to stay efficient and productive by writing scripts to automate internal reporting tasks.
Testimonials.name: Founder, Summit Partners
